findings.title: Deployer can set and modify taxes/fees with an indefinite amount
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to set and modify taxes or fees without any limitations, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Deployer cannot mint after initial deployment
findings.description: The deployer loses the ability to mint new tokens after the initial deployment.

findings.title: Deployer cannot pause/lock the contract
findings.description: The deployer does not have the capability to pause or lock the smart contract.

findings.title: Deployer cannot burn tokens
findings.description: The deployer does not have the ability to burn tokens after initial deployment.

findings.title: Deployer cannot set max transaction limit
findings.description: The deployer does not have the capability to set a maximum transaction limit.
